name: Rescue Craze
description:
The city is burning and people need to be rescued. In this 2D top down game, you drive a firetruck around a city while trying to save all of the victims. Using car movement mechanics, maneuver your way through the buildings and trees to rescue the victims before the timer runs out!

Instructions: Explore the map and see how many people you can save within the time limit.

How to play: Press the up arrow key to accelerate. Use the left or right keys to move after accelerating. Press the down arrow key to go in reverse.
